name: aftermath

effect.sword-shield: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.the-crown-tundra: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect.legends-arceus: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.

short_effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

flavor_text.sword-shield: Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
